synopsis.text:
World s collide when a mysterious portal opens above the Sea of Japan, unleashing otherworldly beasts into the sky. Amidst this spectacle, renowned scientists Joe and Marie Hayakawa are inexplicably drawn into the rift. They return with fantastical tales, publishing a groundbreaking book titled "Day of Succession." However, when they venture back into the portal and disappear, their determined twins, Ai and Yu, resolve to find them.

Following clues from their parents' research, the twins discover an abandoned subway station housing a peculiar train that leads to the enigmatic realm known as Wonderland. Joined by the enigmatic Lisa and a brooding spirit summoner named Kaze, Ai and Yu embark on a journey through a world teeming with magic, mythical creatures, and unfathomable mysteries.

As they navigate the strange and captivating landscape of Wonderland, the group forms unbreakable bonds while facing unimaginable challenges. But will their courage and resourcefulness be enough to find the missing scientists and return home safely? Only time will tell as Ai, Yu, Lisa, and Kaze delve deeper into the heart of Wonderland, where astonishing discoveries and formidable foes await them at every turn.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
